CollaborationGroupMemberRequest.name: CollaborationGroupMemberRequest
CollaborationGroupMemberRequest.description: Represents a request to join a private Chatter group.

CollaborationGroupId.description: ID of the private Chatter group.

RequesterId.description: ID of the user requesting to join the group; must be the ID of the context user.

ResponseMessage.description: Optional message to be included in the notification email when Status is Declined.

Status.description: The status of the request. Available values are: Accepted Declined Pending
